information.comments: For Provided Retail option, put retail version in full directory, so that full/etqw-rthread exists inside the steam installed demo directory. For Demo, download the demo, run and follow the steps, then copy the files to demo/ inside the steam installed demo directory. Uses sdlcl, Applying settings in Settings menu might result black screen; return to desktop, exit and restart the game.
information.author: d10sfan

information.comments: On first start, license key will be requested, which can be found in Steam by getting the CD Key. Mods should go in the linuxdata directory. Adds foxWSFix by default.
